com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.services

Interface IMoodEventServiceProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoodEventService

    public interface IMoodEventServiceProvider
    Interface for providing database services for MoodEvent objects. Allows the specific service provider to be substituted out with little hassle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnFeedUpdateListener
      Listener interface to get the new feed (MoodEvents of users you are following) upon an update
      static interface  IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnImageUploadListener
      Listener interface to get the filepath of the newly uploaded image
      static interface  IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodHistoryUpdateListener
      Listener interface to get the new mood history upon an update
      static interface  IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodUpdateListener
      Listener interface to notify when mood is added/updated.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getFeedUpdates

        void getFeedUpdates(IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnFeedUpdateListener listener)
        Listen to feed updates of the current user. Calls the listener onFeedUpdate with the new feed when a change occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to pass the new feed to

      • addMoodEvent

        java.lang.String addMoodEvent(MoodEvent moodEvent,
                              IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodUpdateListener listener)
        Add a Mood Event to the database.
        Parameters:
        moodEvent - The mood event to add

      • editMoodEvent

        void editMoodEvent(MoodEvent moodEvent,
                   IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodUpdateListener listener)
        Edit an existing MoodEvent on the database.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to notify upon completion of edit.
        moodEvent - The MoodEvent to edit.

      • uploadImage

        void uploadImage(IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnImageUploadListener listener,
                 android.net.Uri imageToUpload)
        Listen to mood history updates of the current user. Calls the listener's onMoodHistoryUpdate method with the new mood history list when a change occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to pass the new mood history list to
        imageToUpload - The Uri to upload to FireBase.

      • getMoodHistoryUpdates

        void getMoodHistoryUpdates(IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodHistoryUpdateListener listener)
        Listen to mood history updates of the current user. Calls the listener's onMoodHistoryUpdate method with the new mood history list when a change occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to pass the new mood history list to

      • getMoodHistoryUpdates

        void getMoodHistoryUpdates(IMoodEventServiceProvider.OnMoodHistoryUpdateListener listener,
                           EmotionalState filterBy)
        Listen to mood history updates of the current user. Calls the listener's onMoodHistoryUpdate method with the new mood history list when a change occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to pass the new mood history list to
        filterBy - The EmotionalState to filter the list by.
